Compatibility matrix#

Applies to Linux and Windows

2024-10-03

15 min read time

Use this matrix to view the ROCm compatibility and system requirements across successive major and minor releases.

You can also refer to the past versions of ROCm compatibility matrix.

Accelerators and GPUs listed in the following table support compute workloads (no display information or graphics). If you’re using ROCm with AMD Radeon or Radeon Pro GPUs for graphics workloads, see the Use ROCm on Radeon GPU documentation to verify compatibility and system requirements.

Footnotes

[1]

RHEL 9.4 is supported only on AMD Instinct MI300A.

[2] (1,2)

Oracle Linux is supported only on AMD Instinct MI300X.

[3]

For ROCm 6.2.2 - MI300X (gfx942) is supported on listed operating systems except Ubuntu 22.04.5 [6.8 HWE] and Ubuntu 22.04.4 [6.5 HWE].

[4]

For ROCm 6.2.1 - MI300X (gfx942) is supported on listed operating systems except Ubuntu 22.04.5 [6.8 HWE] and Ubuntu 22.04.4 [6.5 HWE].

[5]

For ROCm 6.1.0 - MI300A (gfx942) is supported on Ubuntu 22.04.4, RHEL 9.4, RHEL 9.3, RHEL 8.9, and SLES 15 SP5. MI300X (gfx942) is only supported on Ubuntu 22.04.4.

[6]

ROCm provides forward and backward compatibility between the Kernel Fusion Driver (KFD) and its user space software for +/- 2 releases. These are the compatibility combinations that are currently supported.

Footnotes

[7] (1,2,3)

RHEL 9.4 is supported only on AMD Instinct MI300A.

[8] (1,2,3,4,5)

Oracle Linux is supported only on AMD Instinct MI300X.

[9]

For ROCm 6.2.2 - MI300X (gfx942) is supported on listed operating systems except Ubuntu 22.04.5 [6.8 HWE] and Ubuntu 22.04.4 [6.5 HWE].

[10]

For ROCm 6.2.1 - MI300X (gfx942) is supported on listed operating systems except Ubuntu 22.04.5 [6.8 HWE] and Ubuntu 22.04.4 [6.5 HWE].

[11]

For ROCm 6.2.0 - MI300X (gfx942) is supported on listed operating systems except Ubuntu 22.04.5 [6.8 HWE] and Ubuntu 22.04.4 [6.5 HWE].

[12]

For ROCm 6.1.2 - MI300A (gfx942) is supported on Ubuntu 22.04.4, RHEL 9.4, RHEL 9.3, RHEL 8.9, and SLES 15 SP5. MI300X (gfx942) is only supported on Ubuntu 22.04.4 and Oracle Linux.

[13]

For ROCm 6.1.1 - MI300A (gfx942) is supported on Ubuntu 22.04.4, RHEL 9.4, RHEL 9.3, RHEL 8.9, and SLES 15 SP5. MI300X (gfx942) is only supported on Ubuntu 22.04.4 and Oracle Linux.

[14]

For ROCm 6.1.0 - MI300A (gfx942) is supported on Ubuntu 22.04.4, RHEL 9.4, RHEL 9.3, RHEL 8.9, and SLES 15 SP5. MI300X (gfx942) is only supported on Ubuntu 22.04.4.

[15]

For ROCm 6.0.2 - MI300A (gfx942) is supported on Ubuntu 22.04.3, RHEL 8.9, and SLES 15 SP5. MI300X (gfx942) is only supported on Ubuntu 22.04.3.

[16]

For ROCm 6.0.0 - MI300A (gfx942) is supported on Ubuntu 22.04.3, RHEL 8.9, and SLES 15 SP5. MI300X (gfx942) is only supported on Ubuntu 22.04.3.

[17]

ROCm provides forward and backward compatibility between the Kernel Fusion Driver (KFD) and its user space software for +/- 2 releases. These are the compatibility combinations that are currently supported.
